<!--Lab: Add a binding expression that displays the
               "displayName" property of the object in the scope property "book". -->

<tr ng-repeat="field in book.fields">
    <!--Lab: Add td elements that contain binding expressions that display
             the following properties in the object in the scope property "fields":
             displayName, type, and required -->

<!--Lab: Add a binding expression that displays the
               "displayName" property of the current "field" object. -->
